= TArray =
https://docs.unrealengine.com/latest/INT/Programming/UnrealArchitecture/TArrays/
{{{class="brush:c++"
	TArray<Data> MyArray;
	
	// 添加10个空项
	MyArray.AddZeroed(10);
	
	// 添加唯一项
	MyArray.AddUnique(1234);
	
	// 删除一个位置
	MyArray.RemoveAt(1);
	
	// 长度
	MyArray.Num();
	
	// 清空，区别见网址
	MyArray.Clean();
	MyArray.Reset();
	
}}}
